title: shrI padmanAbhA
sahitya:
shrI padmanAbhA undan tiruvaDi tuNai svAmi dEvA
tiruvanantapura vAsanE shrInivAsanE parama puruSanE prabhO


anupallavi

  tApatrayangaLAl mottuNDu taLarndarivizhandu unai maranda enakku


caraNam    sakala uyirgaTkum nIyE tandai tAyum malarvaLar mAtA vanrO
naghai mukhamuDan alaikaDal tuyil varadA nAgashyana rAmadAsan paNiyum
